# UITableViewCell.SeparatorStyle.singleLine

**Case**

The separator cell has a single line running across its width.

## Declaration

```swift
case singleLine
```

## Discussion

This is the default value.

## Constants

- **UITableViewCell.SeparatorStyle.none**: The separator cell has no distinct style.
- **UITableViewCell.SeparatorStyle.singleLineEtched**: The separator cell has double lines running across its width, giving it an etched look.
